allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Build complete React frontend application with Vite, TypeScript, and Material-UI

Implemented a full-featured Pattern Discovery Agent frontend that connects to the A2A backend:

- Set up Vite + React 18 + TypeScript project structure
- Installed core dependencies: React Router, TanStack Query, MUI, axios, zustand, recharts
- Created comprehensive A2A API client with full TypeScript types for all endpoints
- Implemented React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations
- Built responsive layout with sidebar navigation and Material-UI theme
- Created six main pages: Dashboard, Repositories, Patterns, Configuration, Deployment, Agents
- Added real-time API health monitoring and toast notifications
- Configured environment variables for development and production
- Added ESLint, TypeScript, and Vite configuration files
- Created CLAUDE.md for future AI assistant context

The application is fully functional and ready for development/deployment.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(compliance\): add complete architectural compliance validation system

Implemented comprehensive repository compliance validation feature with:

## Architecture Compliance System
- Three A2A skills: validate_repository_architecture, check_specific_standard, suggest_improvements
- TypeScript types for compliance responses with severity levels \(critical/high/medium/low\)
- React Query hooks for compliance data fetching with proper caching

## UI Components
- ComplianceScoreCard: Overall compliance score with A-F grade and circular progress
- ComplianceViolationsList: Violations with severity color-coding and recommendations
- ComplianceCategoryCard: Expandable category results with detailed violation breakdown
- RecommendationsList: Prioritized improvements with effort and impact estimates
- A2AIntegrationStatus: Shows which external agents \(monitoring, orchestrator, pattern-miner\) were notified
- ComplianceResults: Master component combining all above with summary statistics

## Compliance Page
- Full-featured form to validate repositories with optional scope selection
- 10 validation standards: license, documentation, terraform_init, multi_env, terraform_state, disaster_recovery, deployment, postgresql, ci_cd, containerization
- Toggle between full validation and improvement suggestions

## Configuration Improvements
- Fix API settings persistence issue - now loads from localStorage on app startup
- Added setBaseUrl\(\) method to a2aClient for dynamic API endpoint changes
- Configuration auto-applies on app launch and when saved
- Test Connection button to verify API reachability with detailed error messages

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(agents\): improve agent components and skill execution

Refactored agent-related components for better code organization and maintainability:

## Changes
- Updated SkillCard with improved styling and layout
- Enhanced SkillExecutor with better error handling
- Refactored SkillResultDisplay for cleaner component structure
- Improved useAgents hook with better state management
- Reorganized Agents page with improved UI/UX

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
